code: X <- SpecificConverter(a_ScorzProfile = ready4use::Ready4useRepos(gh_repo_1L_chr = "ready4-dev/scorz",                                                                    gh_tag_1L_chr = "Documentation_0.0") %>%                          ingest(fls_to_ingest_chr = "ymh_ScorzEuroQol5",                                 metadata_1L_lgl = F)) %>%   metamorphose() class(X) ## [1] "SpecificModels" ## attr(,"package") ## [1] "specific"

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: dataset using total 1786 records two timepoints 1068 study participants. first six records reproduced . Dataset source dataset X contained a_YouthvarsProfile slot YouthvarsSeries module. information methods can used explore dataset, read vignette youthvars package.

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: preparation exploring dataset, need declare set model parameters b_SpecificParameters slot X. can done one step, sequential steps. example, proceed sequentially.

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: dependent variable (total EQ-5D utility score) already specified imported data ScorzEuroQol5 module. can now add details allowable range dependent variable values.

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: can now specify names candidate predictor variables. next add meta-data candidate predictor variable form specific_predictors object. specific_predictors object added X can inspected using exhibitSlot method.
code: X <- renewSlot(X,                "b_SpecificParameters@candidate_predrs_chr",                new_val_xx = c("K10_int","Psych_well_int")) X <- renewSlot(X,                 "b_SpecificParameters@predictors_lup",                 short_name_chr = c("K10_int","Psych_well_int"),                long_name_chr = c("Kessler Psychological Distress - 10 Item Total Score",                                  "Overall Wellbeing Measure (Winefield et al. 2012)"),                min_val_dbl = c(10,18),                max_val_dbl = c(50,90),                class_chr = "integer",                increment_dbl = 1,                class_fn_chr = "as.integer",                mdl_scaling_dbl = 0.01,                covariate_lgl = F) exhibitSlot(X,             "b_SpecificParameters@predictors_lup")

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: start use data stored X undertake modelling, must first validate contains necessary (internally consistent) data using ratify method.

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: add details directory write output. example create temporary directory (tempdir()), practice existing directory local machine. can useful save fake data (useful demonstrating generalisability replicability analysis) real data (required write-reproducibility) distinctly labelled directories. default, X created flag save output sub-directory “Real”. using fake data, can override value. can now write number sub-directories specified output directory.
code: X <- renewSlot(X,                "paths_chr",                tempdir()) X <- renewSlot(X,                "b_SpecificParameters@fake_1L_lgl",                T) X <- author(X,             what_1L_chr = "workspace")

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: first set outputs write output directories set descriptive tables plots.

title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: investigate method can now used compare candidate models specified earlier. transform X SpecificPredictors object. investigate method write model tested new sub-directory output directory. investigate method also outputs table summarising performance candidate models. Comparison candidate models using highest correlated predictor can now identify highest performing model category candidate model based testing R2 statistic. can override automated selections instead incorporate considerations (possibly based judgments informed visual inspection plots desirability constraining predictions maximum value one). following command, specifying new preferred model types, descending order preference.
code: X <- investigate(X) exhibit(X,         what_1L_chr = "mdl_cmprsn",         type_1L_chr = "results") procure(X,         what_1L_chr = "prefd_mdls") # Fix for NA_ returns (one option within ctg) ## [1] "BET_LGT" "OLS_NTF" X <- renew(X,            new_val_xx = c("BET_LGT", "OLS_CLL"),            type_1L_chr = "results",            what_1L_chr = "prefd_mdls")

Preferred single predictor model performance candidate predictor Updated versions models previous step (time covariates added) saved new subdirectory output directory can summarise performance updated models, along signficant model terms, table. can now identify , , candidate covariates previously specified significant predictors models. can override covariates select, potentially want select covariates significant models. title: Undertake An Exploratory Modelling Analysis
text: Prior undertaking longitudinal mixed modelling, need check appropriateness default values modelling parameters stored X. include number model iterations, custom control parameters priors (default, empty lists). many cases need specify custom control parameters priors using defaults may speed execution. However, example using default control parameters result warning messages suggesting change adapt_delta control value (default = 0.8). Modifying adapt_delta control parameter value can address issue. last call investigate function wrote models tests sub-directory output directory along plots model.
